summary: A teenager wins a fully-automated dream house in a competition, but soon the computer controlling it begins to take over and everything gets out of control. Then teenage Ben must calm the computer named PAT.
cast: Katey Sagal|Ryan Merriman|Katie Volding|Kevin Kilner|Jessica Steen|Emilio Borelli|Paul Linke|Jason Lansing|Joshua Boyd|Raquel Beaudene|Niles Calloway|Sean P. Donahue|Nicole Bailey|Rachel Duncan|Susan Haskell|Logan O'Brien|Jocelyn Basham|Grady Hutt|Dena Burton|Eric Steinberg|Jessica Stevens
keywords: smart house|lifting person in air|liquid|disney channel original movie|laser cutter
title: Hogar, inteligente hogar
